Please provide a test case and a description of how the problem occurs.
A stack trace by itself is not all that informative without a reproduceable 
testcase and I cannot reproduce the problem currently.

You are opening a launch configuration dialog on an Ant launch configuration 
using "Ant Build...". Does this always happen? Only for a single buildfile? If 
so, how is that buildfile special?

Either way of launching ant with any build file cause this to happen. I change 
the workspace to a new one and it stopped to happen. but I would like to keep 
my old projects....
Yes but what triggered the start of the problems in the old workspace?

Without more details of what was causing the problem and without being able to 
reproduce I am going to mark this as invalid.
